sub_title: Deployment & Migration Technical Specialist with HCL Technologies BV
summary: ITIL and Prince 2 Certified professional having record for delivery and management support spanning over 14 years’ in the roles of Project Manager, Deployment and Migration  Agile Business Analyst consulting and Transition Manager from On-shore to Off-shore, financial analysis, continual process improvement and adept project planning, risk and issue management. Conversant in many of the project methodologies such as Waterfall, Agile. PMP and Prince2 .I regularly uses my knowledge and experience with these methodologies to leverage technology and lessons learned to ensure the quality of the Project/ Program deliveries. I am able to work at the strategic level whilst at the same time understand the detail and consistently form strong teams to ensure business outcomes are achieved. I have a intuitive and influential stakeholder management and leadership skills and can able to quickly build relationships with stakeholders at all levels within organizations, resolving conflicts to move projects forward. I try to create a positive atmosphere, forming and leading teams that are highly motivated and focused on achieving their goals. I quickly understand what is important to other people and able to communicate in a way which they will understand, highlighting the important facts and getting the relevant buy in. Quick to grasp and understand the diverse corporate goals of customers and able to relate this to the decisions which need to be made during the project lifecycle. I try to be a good negotiator both internally and with 3rd party suppliers where I ensures that timescales are adhered to, value for money is achieved and quality is delivered.

profile_positions.title: Deployment & Migration Technical Specialist with HCL Technologies BV

profile_positions.description:
-Build and Migration projects completed for Barclays Geneva, Frankfurt, Stockholm and  Amsterdam
- Deploying desktops for Barclays Branches across Europe
-Responsible for Windows 10 & VDI support transition. 
- Ensuring software are installed and working on new devices
- Led a small team for a pilot rollout of laptops for overseas Barclays Bank in Geneva
- Responsible for the build/ imaging of Windows 10 laptops.
- Responsible for the installation of  (desktop icons, bookmarks, favorites, outlook). 
- Mapped homeshare and network drives, setup of bitlocker. 
- Advised users as to how to connect through VPN.
- Liaison with other technology teams to ensure any build issues are resolved.
- Assist with inventory management, ensuring migration task can continually be met.
- Resolve Windows 10 issues generated via Support ticket management system.
- Managed builds, ensuring laptops were set up in the correct AD and SEP groups, user accounts in the correct user groups, amending/correcting user profiles paths in AD, setting up shared mailboxes, restoring pst files
-Import PST files into outlook inbox.
- Reimage existing Windows 7 machines to Windows 10.
- Monitor all users incidents and service requests and collaborate with support teams to ensure effective and timely resolution.
-Work as technical floor walking to help and support users for various issues.
I-nstalling applications and certificates manual as well in the absence of SCCM.
-Pushed applications on SCCM during staging.
-Adding users and groups on Active directory and know how to resolve in case of errors.
profile_positions.title: Global Deployment & Migration Engineer at Barclays

profile_positions.description:
	Responsible for Employees recruitment, on-boarding and meeting them often pertaining to any issues for timesheets and billing.
	Maintain all Employees data on Mercury and Monday.com
	Arrange calls with Employees to check if their projects delivered on time. 
	Track record of resources who are working with various Clients. 
	Finance support – checking invoices and monthly payroll.
	Managing the stock-ordering office supplies.
	Maintain and negotiate with vendors for office work, banners, car lease etc.
	All other (administrative) support needed
	Event Management – Arranging parties and get together for Gazelle employees. 
	Responsible for resource management process
	Setting up meetings, taking notes, following up on actions 
	Ensure Monthly SLA’s are monitored and updated by all levels of management in Mercury. 
	Support team staff adequately to accomplish service needs of client.
	Maintain timesheets reports, delivery time analysis report.
	Build strong, trust-based relationships with assigned customers /contractors and drive results toward continued business growth and high customer satisfaction
profile_positions.title: Relationship Manager

profile_positions.description:
PMO/ Project Manager with the responsibility of ensuring the following key elements were delivered
•	Monitor, track and managing the progress against milestones, deadlines, and budget. Reporting these key factors to internal and external project Stakeholders.
•		Manage and delivered various projects throughout the life cycle stages. Ensured that projects are delivered on-time, within its budget, scope, schedule and meet customer’s business and technical requirement.
	Preparing Project Charter, Work-Orders, work order variations, billing reports, budget and margins, resource forecasting etc. 
	Develop customer communication plans, define the delivery team roles and responsibilities on the project, plan and manage project schedules.
	Maintain all project documentation and communication for team such as   lessons learned, issue logs and facilitate issue resolution. 
	Responsible for resource management by keeping track record of all resource assignments to the projects, keeping note of resource movement as per the project’s requirement.
	Keeping a track that all project documentation, project plans, requirements and design documents, manage sign off, customer change control and project close out processes maintain by the team. 
	Identified the scope for improvement of quality of the work delivered to client.
	Understand technicality of business level, functional and technical solution requirements and be able to facilitate communication and coordinate discussions that drive decisions at the appropriate stage of the process.
	End to end transitions, product solutions from initiation to Go-live with high level of standards delivered. 
•	Achievements: Received an Award in Year 2012 for exemplary work in The Co-Operative Bank
profile_positions.title: Assistant Manager Transitions

profile_positions.description:
Performed the role of Quality Control and Assurance at Air Sahara, delivering the following key responsibilities:
•	Responsible for the management of Customer complaints which was addressed to CEO pertaining to Airports, Cargo, Customer Service, In-flights, Business Class up gradations, Tarmac
•	Responsible for performing the Service Audits at all Airports across the network to better understand and identify the customer grievance and techniques of how to pacify them
•	Assisted Station Managers and Human Resources in fact finding for cases of misconduct against employees who were involved in pilferages or any other intolerable activity towards the company
•	Responsible for the issue of letters of compensation and apology to esteemed customers on behalf of CEO
•	Administration responsibilities for Senior Management
profile_positions.title: Senior Officer
